name: oldsort
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool betsports.
Tool description: BetSports Api
API description: Fetches and sorts data from the oldsort endpoint using the given RapidAPI host and key.

host.description: The host to be used in the request header. Defaults to 'www.mozzartbet.com.co'.

referer.description: The referer to be used in the request header. Defaults to 'https://www.mozzartbet.com.co/es'.
